lead_paragraph: The police in Belgium have detained several men connected to the bombings, the prosecutors’ office said, and one is a fugitive connected to the Paris attacks.

byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin and Lilia Blaise contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Fugitive Arrested in Brussels Is a Suspect in Paris Attacks, Investigators Say
headline.main: More Suspects in Brussels Attacks Arrested in Belgium

snippet: The police in Belgium have detained several men connected to the bombings, the prosecutors’ office said, and one is a fugitive connected to the Paris attacks.
abstract: Belgian authorities say Mohamed Abrini, one of five people arrested in connection with Brussels attacks, was fugitive suspected of involvement in Paris bombings; arrest raises question of how wanted man could evade Belgian investigators for months.
